BoardView

Class to define the view of the board, it means, to define the visual of our program.  There is where Clutter have the action

Parameters

playersnumber of players
sideSizenumber of squares to play
Summary
BoardViewClass to define the view of the board, it means, to define the visual of our program.
Functions
markMoveThis function allow you to show a move from one player.

Functions

markMove

markMove : function(clickedSquare,
player)

This function allow you to show a move from one player.  The function will draw a “X” or a “O” depending of the player.

Parameters

clickedSquareThe square that is been clicked by the user.
playerwich player click the square.
markMove : function(clickedSquare,
player)
This function allow you to show a move from one player.
